channel.title: My Sig
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i24.tinypic.com/33oqz9u.png[/img]
This is my first sig with a pen tool cuz i dont normally use. Please C&C

item.title: My Sig
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:5, topic:151184”]Err, it hurts my eyes.

Do some background editing, and I noticed you use a pattern. Don’t do that.

You need a unique pattern, but the left and right side should have some related items.

On the other hand, you have a pretty good use of C4Ds, but give them a bit less opacity.

One more thing.

DO NOT make your name noticeable every time someone looks at it, that destroys the texture. You should use the text with small size, and make the layer Soft Light, if you are using PS. That will make the inside of the text transparent, or use a very small text with colorful colors, so it is soft on the eyes, and a bit of texture usage. If you make the text super noticeable, it RUINS it![/quote]

k… but i didnt use a pattern.

Read full topic

item.title: My Sig
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Err, it hurts my eyes.

Do some background editing, and I noticed you use a pattern. Don’t do that.

You need a unique pattern, but the left and right side should have some related items.

On the other hand, you have a pretty good use of C4Ds, but give them a bit less opacity.

One more thing.

DO NOT make your name noticeable every time someone looks at it, that destroys the texture. You should use the text with small size, and make the layer Soft Light, if you are using PS. That will make the inside of the text transparent, or use a very small text with colorful colors, so it is soft on the eyes, and a bit of texture usage. If you make the text super noticeable, it RUINS it!

Read full topic
